item.description:
Meet at 10:30 in the parking lot off of Lake Ave, adjacent the pond.

This is a lovely little pond with a 2 mile trail looping around it. There are some side trails we will explore also, so that we are walking for 2 hours. The link below brings you to a map that you can click on to get more information on various aspects of the pond and its surroundings.

www.woburnmaps.com/hornpond/HORNPOND.HTM

Afterwards we will have Brazilian food. Load up your plate for just $5.49 per pound!


Tudo Na Brasa
414 Main St
Woburn, MA 01801
(781) 938-0101
item.name: Horn Pond & Brazilian
